original_text: If a woman no longer has a husband, she must do whatever she has promised to the Lord. Maybe she is a widow, or she has become separate from her husband.
korean_text: 과부나 이혼 당한 여자의 서원이나 그가 결심한 모든 서약은 지킬 것이니라

sentences.original_text: If a woman no longer has a husband
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 여성이 더 이상 남편이 없다면

sentences.original_text: she must do whatever she has promised to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 주께 약속한 모든 것을 반드시 지켜야 합니다

sentences.original_text: or she has become separate from her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그녀가 남편과 헤어졌을 수도 있습니다
